Name: ID
Variable description: Participant's anonymous study number/identifier

Name: Date
Variable description: Date experiment was administered

Name: Condition
Variable description: Participant's assigned study condition (block design)
Scoring: H = Heavy condition clipboard used during session; L = Light condition clipboard used during session

Name: Collector
Variable description: Initials of researcher and/or research assistants who collected corresponding data

Name: Location
Variable description: Indicated location in Charlottesville in which corresponding data was collected

Name: DS
Variable description: Confirmation of data scored twice
Scoring: 1 = Double scoring completed; 0 = Double scoring incomplete

Name: IC
Variable description: Informed consent administered for session
Scoring: 0 = No consent was received; 1 = written consent was received; 2 = verbal consent was received

Name: Comp.
Variable description: Compensation (one $5 gift card) awarded for participation
Scoring: 1 = Gift card compensation was awarded for participation; 0 = gift card was not awarded for participation

Name: Age
Variable description: Participant's reported age on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: Gender
Variable description: Participant's reported gender on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: Student
Variable description: Participant's reported student status on Candidate Evaluation
Scoring: Y = Yes (Student); N = No (Not a student)

Name: Mjr./Occ.
Variable description: Participant's reported major or occupation
Scoring: Full occupation and/or major title recorded

Name: ES1.1
Variable description: Recorded response to question 1 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.2
Variable description: Recorded response to question 2 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.3
Variable description: Recorded response to question 3 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.4
Variable description: Recorded response to question 4 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.5
Variable description: Recorded response to question 5 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.6
Variable description: Recorded response to question 6 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.7
Variable description: Recorded response to question 7 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: ES1.8
Variable description: Recorded response to question 8 on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: IS.1
Variable description: Recorded response to self-evaluated importance question on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: Eff.1
Variable description: Recorded response to self-evaluated effort question on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: Exc.
Variable description: Exclusion of data following pre-specified exclusion rules
Scoring: 0 = No exclusion applied to data; 1 = exclusion applied to data

Name: Comments
Variable description: Comment range to indicate reasoning for exclusions and/or record of comments written by participant on Candidate Evaluation form

Name: Collection
Variable description: Round of SSRP collection (1st round (90% confidence to predict 75% of the original effect size) or 2nd (90% confidence to predict 50% of the original effect size))
Scoring: 1 = 1st round of data collection; 2 = 2nd round of data collection
